author: pdobacz
content: One can also further complicate this scenario, where in the tx I call account C, which calls CREATE/CREATE2, which creates the B, and only afterwards C calls A, causing the selfdestruct. I suppose the end result should be the same, but this crosses paths with eip-6780 even more

author: jochembrouwer
content: Yeah we definitely should not selfdestruct the EOA otherwise you get the weird situation that you can also start to replay txs ðŸ˜…
